website_summaries.verdict: While this claw machine comes with more features and capabilities than similar models in its class, it also has some quality and longevity concerns.
pros: Stands out for including a remote controller that can be used to operate the machine from a distance
Plays music and has flashing lights
Can be operated with batteries or included power cord
cons: A few owners find the music annoying
A bit difficult to set up
Some reports of units that quit working after several weeks or months

customer_reviews.title: A fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My kids always love to try claw claw grabbers at the arcade. I can't count how much we have spent on it, which is the major reason I decide to buy this one as a birthday gift. Here are the pros and cons of this product based on our past two weeks' experience: Pros: The toy is compact, portable and easy to store. The design is great with the remote controller and tokens. The assembly process is not too hard. Cons: The plastic material could be improved with smooth edges. The music does get slightly annoying, but it isn't too awful bad. Overall, it is really a fun alternative to real claw games. We've all enjoyed this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: JUNK Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the first one, got it all put together and the remote wouldn't work. No way to take it apart once you put it together so I had to find a big box to load it into. I received a replacement, put it all together and the claw won't drop to pick up the toys. Grrrrrrr I'm sending it back and asking for a refund. Don't bother with this toy
customer_reviews.author: Beth CochranTop Contributor: Fashion Design

customer_reviews.title: learn from the toy b patient n concentrated
customer_reviews.text: good design. this claw toy is much attractive to kids like 5-6 years so my kids love it very much. it's safe n let u use remote control to grasp items. as a colorful toy may let kid learn to remote control or concentrate to grasp sth not by hands. it's really useful and if u play it well u must be patient as maybe many times failures. i would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: joy zzg

customer_reviews.title: Fun working claw machine
customer_reviews.text: It took a little bit of time to put together especially, the cables. Once it's done, it works well. You can pick up dolls well. She loves playing with it. Micro USB helps save batteries in other claw machines. Overall, it works well and enjoyed by my daughter. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel K.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea, very poor execution. Poorly crafted cheap materials. It worked one time for 10 minutes and never turned on again. Worthless present for one disappointed child🤬
customer_reviews.author: Kh92

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: We had to return this item as it came with a broken piece. It was a bit more difficult to put together and so disappointing when we realized the joystick was broken. The little toys that came with it weren't well made either. Several had stitching that had come undone in the back and stuffing was coming out. Unfortunately, this one just wasn't for us.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my amazingly autistic children. It works on a lot of skills such as fine motor, turn taking, working for a reward, etc... The machine itself is great. I love that you can add anything you want. We have added everything such as small play doh, magnetic butterflies, candy, puff balls, jingle bells, etc... It's amazing. Because you can constantly add new things it never gets boring.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Caswell

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a month
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a month. No way to fix stuck claw that wouldnt retract. Maybe we just got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: gregory h

customer_reviews.title: children play very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this claw machine! its perfect for the kids! very easy to set up! as soon as i got this machine, the kids can't wait to play! love the ideas that you have to insert the game currency to play! and the music that plays while you play its nice too, and the lights, kids just love it! i even like to play this ,its so much fun! and i put more toys and those mini pack snacks in it, make it more fun! children play very happy.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy toy that broke after one day. Motorized claw will not stay in grooves and gets stuck. Piece of junk for the price. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Wysocki

customer_reviews.title: Started smoking!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, this item started smoking after 10 minutes of use. Beware! Smoke was coming from the motor that controlled the claw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my son after he saw it on a YouTube video because it looked so cool and fun! It turned out to be a great toy and (we - dad included) enjoy playing with it. Works well and like the option of battery or usb cable.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: Had to return went for other brand as it didnt work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Funny product
customer_reviews.text: this product is very fantastic and very funny! The quality of this product is very good. It is easy to setup and use! It is a very good choice for a gift to the kids! My two kids had a very good time with this product! They had a lot of funs. Also I love to play with this too! I am very recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BSC

customer_reviews.title: Such perfect gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for Christmas presents for multiple kids to share, and it’s the perfect budget friendly gift for kids to share and it’s so much fun! We liked putting ring pops in them.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Can’t stop playing
customer_reviews.text: It is so fun to play! Super easy to assembly. I did not need to refer to the manual at all but the manual itself is very clear. It can be charged by usb and by battery. Unfortunately batteries do not come with it. I like that you have to place a coin in order to play. Feels very real. Just like a real claw machine. I played one hour straight despite the fact that I bought it as a gift for my son.
customer_reviews.author: lin

customer_reviews.title: Kids have fun with it.
customer_reviews.text: This claw machine is easy to set up. My kids have a fun time playing with it, and I really like that it has volume options, so I can have the sound turned off. It is played like a real claw machine. The coins can be placed in the slot easily and there are multiple tries for a toy. The claw is easy to control, though it takes a little practice.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: claw machine
customer_reviews.text: product is good so far. However, it is designed so the prize loading door, in the top, is directly over the prize winning shute at the bottom. That's right, you load the prize and it comes right out the bottom. Functionality Could have been better though out, but the kids are having fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: ViVi

customer_reviews.title: kids love it
customer_reviews.text: It is a super cute and fun toy.The kids love it as much as the high price one at stores.They had hours of fun and they love being able to put their own little surprises inside.
customer_reviews.author: PING

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a real Mini and super cool claw machine. It is fun to play and made of great quality. Controls are easy and simple. My kids love it so much! Also you can add other items whatever you want. Trust me you will have so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: avon

customer_reviews.title: Fun but batteries die fast
customer_reviews.text: The batteries get eaten fast and the plastic seems cheap for the price but my daughter loves it. Fun to play with. It was difficult to put together. Yet the kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: loose wire
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cute but I had to get someone to rewire this because it came with two wires broken. Glad I saw this before I plugged it in. Overall my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: The Swicks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect gift for a five year old. I gave this to my daughter as a birthday gift at her party. I still remember how happy and excited she was when I brought this out. Every kid in the party loved this claw machine. It's so cute and everything mimics the real claw machine. Great quality , too. Love it! I would definitely recommend it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The top gift at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I filled it was other small toys and candy and this was the popular toy at Christmas. Adults loved this as much as the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice claw machine
customer_reviews.text: I like this claw machine than others because this is a lot better quality than others. It’s also cheaper than other claw machines and because of that I think this is a great deal waiting to be found by others. But the toys they come with is a little hard to get so I would recommend using Easter eggs (the small ones) to be the prize.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent claw machine
customer_reviews.text: 8 year old son plays it constantly. Works very well, no problems after a few months of daily play. Very well made, very happy boy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Keep kids hand to himself.
customer_reviews.text: So funny toy claw machine for kid, Ten pieces coin can urge kid make finish high quality homework then to play. Save money then mall claw machine.Amazine!!!
customer_reviews.author: kevin.Liang

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Incredible mini claw machine. It is very effective to exercise my child's control ability. With music, you can extract your surprise in a limit time. Because the coin-operated system makes the machine more real, the two modes are very intrigued. very entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: owen

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My children have not stopped playing with this since we opened it! I love that you can turn down the volume, or even turn it off completely. They love how simple it is to use, and especially love to watch it move on its own in demo mode. It did take more batteries than I was expecting.. But for as happy as it makes my kids, that's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: lovely toy
customer_reviews.text: I always want to play this kind of machine in grocery store/gas station. I bought this one for myself thought my 1 year old son is too young to play this . However I found he is also very happy when watching me play. It brings a lot of happiness to whole family. The machin is well made and beautiful. has recommended to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: DOLLY

customer_reviews.title: The remote is removable.
customer_reviews.text: The machine comes with lot of stuff animals. It is fun an easy to set up. You can put battery in it or charge with the usb cable that came with it. The machine needs the coin to work just like the real big ones. The remote is removable.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Freaking amazing like one of my favorite things I own
customer_reviews.author: Kitten and Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Claw Machine
customer_reviews.text: The Claw Machine is amazing and it’s great. All the children from my family loved it. The kids kept on playing with it, it was easy to set up, the music gave it the real touch, like the arcades, and the 4 plush toys was a great bonus, all our kids were able to win prizes each day. This is great quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: It is really fun and has many ways to play with. The only reason I give 4 stars is that the plash toy, If the seller could add some more, I would give the five stars. Great toy for my kids!

customer_reviews.title: Fun times 😄
customer_reviews.text: I know my granddaughter is gonna love this I can’t wait lol!!! It came super quick, I liked the toys that were in the machine and I bought extra toys also and everything is great my granddaughter is gonna have hours of fun with this, Thankyou...

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Came with two piece Bs and no piece A so we were unable to assemble for use. Disappointed kid on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hipp

customer_reviews.title: Its easy to build, and fun for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth the cost!! It works great and you can put real quarters in it, its a great game that takes up hours of play time, its materials are not cheap, and fun for parties or events, and overall a great place to store toys!!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica R.

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun and Original Gift for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nieces birthday and she LOVED it. She playd with it for hours when she first got it and still continues to play it everyday. Her brothers and sister love to play it too! Assembly required which takes awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The doll machine is very good, this is the fun of interacting with my baby every day. Every time I catch a doll, he will be happy to clap his hands. The only problem is that the remote control needs to use the battery, the battery consumption is faster, and the body can also be plugged into the power supply.

customer_reviews.title: Great grab machine!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My daughter will love this. It is so much fun. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Response to Will Walker’s concern :)
customer_reviews.text: The “toy entrance” is accessible by moving the claw. ;) My son, who just turned nine years old and who likes full-sized claw machines, REALLY likes this.

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Kind of flimsy but not bad for playing with casually at home or when other kids are over for a playdate.

product_meta.title: GMAXT Claw Machine,C1 Claw Toy,2.4G Remote Control Automatic or Manual Dual Mode Mini Claw Machine, Intelligent System with Music and Lighting, Giving Children The Best Gift
feature_bullets: 【The latest odd toys】 A coin-operated catcher with music and lights, one button can grab candy, chewing gum, gashapon, small toys, small plush animals or other prizes.

【Diversified experience】The mini claw machine can control two modes at close range or remotely. The remote control requires 2 AAA batteries, the machine can be plugged in (plug must be ≤ 5V / 2.1A) or install battery (6x2A batteries) Kind of power mode.

【Intelligent design】The game time is 60 seconds, and the item can be rewarded for 40 seconds. With the automatic demonstration function, you can enter the sleep mode without doing any operation within 5 minutes!

【Real Performance】A successful attempt will earn prizes, exercise your child's sense of accomplishment and control, active thinking, encourage creativity, build fine motor skills, and enjoy unlimited fun!
【Multiple choices】 Click on the GMAXT Brand to have more toys you like.30-Day Money Back Guarantee,,30 Day Replacement Warranty and Ready to respond within 24 hours.
